title: Understanding Your Spouse's Personality
itunes:author: Guests: Dr. Kevin Leman
itunes:summary:
Appreciating your spouse's personality can prevent a lot of arguments. But what if your birth order and personality were connected? Erin, Greg and John talk about where they are in the birth-order and how it's influenced their personalities. Featuring Dr. Kevin Leman.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY

The Birth Order Book: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/singleitem/checkout/donation/item/don-fofm-podcast-2020-07-28#refcd=982401

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/understanding-your-spouses-personality

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
